a.column_query: cast(id as text) as id, a_name, a_cat1, a_cat2, a_int, a_real
a.queryStats: select min(a_int) as a_int_min, max(a_int) as a_int_max, min(a_real) as a_real_min, max(a_real) as a_real_max from ${table}
a.queryCategories: select distinct %(col)s as cat from ${table} where %(col)s is not null and %(col)s <> ''
a.querySample: select ${targid_dummy.index} from ${table} t order by random() limit %s
a.querySort: select ${targid_dummy.index}, %s as _score from ${table} t order by _score %s

a_filtered.query: select ${targid_dummy.index}, ${targid_dummy.views.a.column_query} from a t WHERE a_cat1 = :cat

b.column_query: cast(id as text) as id, b_name, b_cat1, b_cat2, b_int, b_real
b.queryStats: select min(b_int) as b_int_min, max(b_int) as b_int_max, min(b_real) as b_real_min, max(b_real) as b_real_max from ${table}
b.queryCategories: select distinct %(col)s as cat from ${table} where %(col)s is not null and %(col)s <> ''
b.querySample: select ${targid_dummy.index} from ${table} t order by random() limit %s
b.querySort: select ${targid_dummy.index}, %s as _score from ${table} t order by _score %s

dummy_detail.query: SELECT cast(a1.b_id as text) as id, a1.ab_real as value1, a2.ab_real as value2 FROM ab a1 INNER JOIN ab a2 ON a1.b_id = a2.b_id WHERE a1.a_id = :a_id1 and a2.a_id = :a_id2

dummy_dependent.query: SELECT cast(a.id as text) as id, a_name, max(ab_int) as score FROM ab INNER JOIN a ON a.id = ab.a_id INNER JOIN  b ON b.id = ab.b_id WHERE ab.ab_cat = :ab_cat AND b.b_cat2 = :b_cat2 AND ab_int > (select max(ab_int) FROM ab INNER JOIN b ON b.id = ab.b_id WHERE ab.ab_cat = :ab_cat AND b.b_cat2 = :b_cat2 AND ab.a_id = :a_id) GROUP BY a.id

score.query: SELECT cast(a_id as text) as id, %(agg)s(%(score)s) as score FROM ab INNER JOIN b ON b.id = ab.b_id WHERE b.b_cat2 = :b_cat2 GROUP BY ab.a_id
